TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit Control/ControlAccessibleObject extends System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject

summary.span: 提供可供協助工具應用程式使用之控制項的相關資訊。

span.span: Provides information about a control that can be used by an accessibility application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows Form 有內建的協助工具支援，並提供您的應用程式，可讓它與協助工具用戶端應用程式搭配運作的相關資訊。Windows Forms has accessibility support built in, and provides information about your application that enables it to work with accessibility client applications. 協助工具用戶端應用程式的範例包括： 畫面加大和檢閱者公用程式、 語音輸入公用程式、 螢幕小鍵盤、 其他輸入的裝置及鍵盤的增強功能的公用程式。Examples of accessibility client applications are: screen enlarger and reviewer utilities, voice input utilities, on-screen keyboards, alternative input devices, and keyboard enhancement utilities. 有時候，您要提供協助工具用戶端應用程式的其他資訊。Sometimes you will want to provide additional information to accessibility client applications. 有兩種方式可以提供這項額外資訊。There are two ways of providing this additional information. 若要提供現有控制項的有限的協助工具資訊，將控制項的， ， ，和將協助工具用戶端應用程式報告的屬性值。To provide limited accessibility information for existing controls, set the control's , , , and property values, which will be reported to accessibility client applications. 或者，如果您需要更多的協助工具資訊，以包含您的控制項，您可以撰寫您自己的類別衍生自或類別。Alternatively, if you require more accessibility information to be included with your control, you can write your own class deriving from the or classes. 比方說，如果您要撰寫您自己的控制項，不衍生自通用控制項，或您需要為您的控制項內點擊測試這類作業，您應該建立為您的控制項，藉由呼叫方法。For example, if you are writing your own control that is not derived from the common controls or you require such operations as hit testing within your control, you should create a for your control by calling the method. > [!NOTE] > 如果您覆寫方法中，您也必須覆寫方法。If you override the method, you must also override the method. 取得或設定屬性，您必須加入的參考`Accessibility`安裝.NET framework 組件。To get or set the property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework. 如需可存取物件的詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN Library 的＜Active Accessibility＞一節。For more information about accessible objects, see the Active Accessibility section of the MSDN Library. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立衍生自的核取方塊控制項類別，並建立自訂使用衍生的類別。The following code example creates a check box control that derives from the class and creates a custom for the derived class to use. 在衍生的類別中， `MyCheckBox`，具有的預設它會顯示為切換按鈕。The derived class, `MyCheckBox`, has an of by default so it appears as a toggle button. 衍生類別， `MyCheckBoxControlAccessibleObject`，覆寫三個屬性來帳戶外觀的相異之處。The derived class, `MyCheckBoxControlAccessibleObject`, overrides three properties to account for the difference in appearance. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject/CPP/controlaccessibility.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject/CS/controlaccessibility.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject/VB/controlaccessibility.vb#1)]

param.name: fileName
param.span: 當這個方法傳回時，會包含一個字串，此字串表示與這個可存取物件相關的說明檔之路徑。

span.span: When this method returns, contains a string that represents the path to the Help file associated with this accessible object.

param.span: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

span.span: Gets an identifier for a Help topic and the path to the Help file associated with this accessible object.

returns.span: 說明主題的識別項，如果沒有說明主題，則為 -1。

span.span: An identifier for a Help topic, or -1 if there is no Help topic.

returns.span: 傳回時， 屬性將會包含與這個可存取物件相關的說明檔之路徑；如果沒有指定任何 介面，則會傳回 。

span.span: On return, the parameter will contain the path to the Help file associated with this accessible object, or if there is no interface specified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 識別碼會傳遞至所指定的 WinHelp 檔案`fileName`參數來識別所需的 [說明] 主題。Pass the identifier to the WinHelp file specified by the `fileName` parameter to identify the desired Help topic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您必須呼叫方法，每個物件的協助工具用戶端應用程式的通知。You must call the method for each object the accessibility client applications are to be notified of. 設定，或從屬性時，通常會呼叫方法的事件處理常式。The method is typically called when a property is set or from within an event handler. 例如，您可能會呼叫方法並傳入的值`Hide`從內的事件處理常式事件。For example, you might call the method and pass in an value of `Hide` from within the event handler for the event.

summary.span: 引發 LiveRegionChanged 使用者介面自動化事件。

span.span: Raises the LiveRegionChanged UI automation event.

returns.span: 若作業成功，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the operation succeeds; otherwise, otherwise.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 針對這個方法會有效，控制項必須實作介面，並將其`LiveSetting`屬性必須傳回或。For this method to be effective, the control must implement the interface, and its `LiveSetting` property must return either or . 此外，應用程式必須重新編譯目標.NET Framework 4.8，或選擇加入這項功能使用相容性參數。In addition, the application must be recompiled to target .NET Framework 4.8 or opt in to this feature by using compatibility switches.

exception.span: 擁有者控制項不是即時區域。

span.span: The owner control is not a live region.
